index.welcome_html: Hello, my name is Lombardo and I'm a Web Developer.

body.text_1: My name is Lombardo Moreno Rodríguez, I'm {0} years old and I'm a Administrative Computation Engineer who lives in Guadalupe, Nuevo León, México.
My goal is to help tomorrow's society though innovative solutions that nakes human life easier.
body.text_2: My objective is to be always be prepared and learn about technology to satisfy the needs of tomorrow.

sections.title: Personal path and knowledge

body.text_1: My first approach with programming was when I was 12 years old when I was coding videogames; but at 2018 I started focusing on the web development area ({0} years from now), I have experience coding Front-end and Back-end. I have worked with the following technologies/tools:

list: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, GDScript and SQL

body.text_1: Inside my {portfolio} you can find the different projects that I've made.
body.text_2: You can contact me through my social channels that you can find in my {cv}.

colorless.body: Colorless it's a 2D platform videogame. Explore 30 challenging levels and help Cuby to get all the skins of his body. Available for Linux, MacOS and Windows.
